description.p: You wake up in your bed with a strange cold feeling. This is not your world. This is a place the time doesn't exist, a place where no living thing mattered, a place that is the end of all things, and the beginning. A black-eyed man adorned in an older-looking suit, with cold shadowy vapors eminating from his body, appears:

p.em: There are greater forces that man call magic, greater places they say that everyone is immortal. But none of them matter here. This is the Void. I am the Outsider, I know and watch all creatures since the beginning. Bacuase I've deemed you interesting, my forces will serve your will. What I have given you is up to you how to use. Know that I will be watching with great interest. Now I return you to your world.

description.p: When you woke up, a new power was present within you. Some say the Outsider is the god of all secrets, time and universes. But in a way, no living can truly understand what he is. For now, it seems no man can perceive who he really is: a bored god? a demon? Or is he just a man? Whatever he may be, the Outsider is far beyond the words used to describe him.

sheet.description: Your patron is the Outsider, who's origin and motives are unknown. The only thing confirmed about him is that people believe he exists.

description.p: The Outsider lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

sheet.description: The Outsider lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell.

description.p: The power of the Void flows through you, giving you proficiency in both Arcana and Stealth.

At 1st level, you are granted access to the power of the Outsider's Bonecharms. You can only use 4 bonecharms at a time, but you can change which ones you have equipped during a short or long rest. You can use two more at 5th level, 10th level, and 15th level respectively.

Bonecharms can be found in the world or crafted using 10gp worth of bone and a Dexterity + Intelligence roll made with Tinker’s Tools. While whale bone is preferred by the Outsider, any bone will do. You gain proficiency with Tinker’s Tools to make these gifts from the Outsider.
Charms must be either found or crafted. Crafting a charm takes an hour. The difficulty of crafting each charm can be seen below:
Starting at 6th level, you can teleport up to 60ft then you gain advantage on your first attack roll.
Once you use this feature as many times ans your proficiency bonus, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: You can teleport up to 60ft as a bonus action then gain advantage on your first attack roll.

description.p: At 10th level, you can use your action to trasform into a shadow for 1 minute and become invisible. Everything you were wearing or carrying seems to merge into the shadowy blob you become. You cease to be invisible if you attack or cast a spell. While in this form, you can make a finesse melee spell attack dealing 4d10 force damage on a hit. You must finish a short or long rest before you can use this feature again.

sheet.description: You become a shadow, blending in to your environment. You become invisible for 1 minute. Within this duration, you can make a finesse melee spell attack dealing 4d10 + {{charisma:modifier}} damage.

description.p: At 14th level, your universal understanding of time changes. You are immune to effects of slow and time stop spells. As a bonus action, you can bend time and reach the supernational limits of speed. For 1d4+1 turns, you can have two actions instead of one.
You must finish a long rest before you can use this feature again.

sheet.description: You are immune to effects of slow and time stop spells. As a bonus action, you can bend time and reach the supernational limits of speed. For 1d4+1 turns, you can have two actions instead of one.

description.p: Your body turns incorporeal and you posess your familiar for up to 1d8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier + your Constitution modifier.

sheet.description: Your body turns incorporeal and you posess your familiar for up to 1d8 + {{possession}} minutes.

description.p: Gain a climbing speed equal to that of your walking speed

sheet.description: Gain a climbing speed equal to that of your walking speed

description.p: When prone, getting up takes no movement.

sheet.description: When prone, getting up takes no movement.

description.p: While this bonecharm is equipped, you are under the effects of the Jump spell.

sheet.description: While this bonecharm is equipped, you are under the effects of the Jump spell.

description.p: Beasts will not be immediately hostile to you when entering combat.

sheet.description: Beasts will not be immediately hostile to you when entering combat.

description.p: Gain advantage when attempting to kill someone from above. Successfully dropping them to 0 hit points will not only kill the target but heal you up to 4d4+5

sheet.description: Gain advantage when attempting to kill someone from above. Successfully dropping them to 0 hit points will not only kill the target but heal you up to 4d4+5

description.p: You are resistant to fire and force damage.

sheet.description: You are resistant to fire and force damage.

description.p: When your health is below 20%, you deal additional 2d10 + your charisma modifier force damage with any attack.

sheet.description: When your health is below 20%, you deal additional 2d10 + {{charisma:modifier}} in force damage with any attack.

description.p: As a reaction, the wearer gains a premonition as to the spell about to be cast. The wearer can give up to half of your proficiency modifier of people advantage on the saving throw.

sheet.description: As a reaction, the wearer gains a premonition as to the spell about to be cast. The wearer can give up to {{proficiency:half}} people advantage on the saving throw.

description.p: You gain +2 to damage rolls made with firearms.

sheet.description: You gain +2 to damage rolls made with firearms.

description.p: You gain +2 to damage rolls made with crossbows.

sheet.description: You gain +2 to damage rolls made with crossbows.

description.p: When taking a short rest, you gain two additional hit die. These hit die regenerate if used after a long rest.

sheet.description: When taking a short rest, you gain two additional hit die. These hit die regenerate if used after a long rest.

description.p: You gain +1 to AC against melee attacks while wielding a bladed weapon.

sheet.description: You gain +1 to AC against melee attacks while wielding a bladed weapon.

description.p: Thrown objects get a +2 to damage rolls.

sheet.description: Thrown objects get a +2 to damage rolls.

description.p: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you heal up to 1d4 damage.

sheet.description: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you heal up to 1d4 damage.

description.p: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you heal up to 1d6 damage.

sheet.description: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you heal up to 1d6 damage.

description.p: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you heal up to 1d8 damage.

sheet.description: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you heal up to 1d8 damage.

description.p: Fall damage is reduced by 1d6 for every 20 feet fallen.

sheet.description: Fall damage is reduced by 1d6 for every 20 feet fallen.

description.p: When an enemy makes a ranged weapon attack against you that uses a firing mechanism, rolla d20. On a 1, their weapon jams and they must spend an action to fix it.

sheet.description: When an enemy makes a ranged weapon attack against you that uses a firing mechanism, rolla d20. On a 1, their weapon jams and they must spend an action to fix it.

description.p: You can cast Identify as a ritual with half the casting time. The details appear within your tome.

sheet.description: You can cast Identify as a ritual with half the casting time. The details appear within your tome.

description.p: Being healed via potion will give you two additional die's worth of health.

sheet.description: Being healed via potion will give you two additional die's worth of health.

description.p: The Outsider will randomly hide magical loot on those you have slain.

sheet.description: The Outsider will randomly hide magical loot on those you have slain.

description.p: Gaze upon a creature with an intelligence score of at least 4. One of it's secrets will appear in your tome.

sheet.description: Gaze upon a creature with an intelligence score of at least 4. One of it's secrets will appear in your tome.

description.p: With this, the wearer of your talisman knows the location of creatures and magical objects within a 60 foot radius.

sheet.description: With this, the wearer of your talisman knows the location of creatures and magical objects within a 60 foot radius.

description.p: When an enemy spots you duing active stealth, you can cast Time Stop. This can be done once per long rest.

sheet.description: When an enemy spots you duing active stealth, you can cast Time Stop. This can be done once per long rest.

description.p: You can move up to 10 additional feet when hidden and not reveal your location.

sheet.description: You can move up to 10 additional feet when hidden and not reveal your location.

description.p: Thrown objects gain +15/+60 to their range.

sheet.description: Thrown objects gain +15/+60 to their range.

description.p: When drinking a health potion, roll a d100. If the result is below a 15, you regain full health

sheet.description: When drinking a health potion, roll a d100. If the result is below a 15, you regain full health

description.p: When drinking a health potion, roll a d100. If the result is below a 30, you regain full health

sheet.description: When drinking a health potion, roll a d100. If the result is below a 30, you regain full health

description.p: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

sheet.description: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

description.p: When an enemy attemps to hit you with a ranged attack, they get a -2 to hit.

sheet.description: When an enemy attemps to hit you with a ranged attack, they get a -2 to hit.

description.p: When an enemy attemps to hit you with a ranged attack, they get a -4 to hit.

sheet.description: When an enemy attemps to hit you with a ranged attack, they get a -4 to hit.

description.p: Enemies have disadvantage on attack rolls made against you with ranged attacks.

sheet.description: Enemies have disadvantage on attack rolls made against you with ranged attacks.

description.p: When you cast a spell, roll a d100. If you roll below your warlock level, you cast that spell without expending the spell slot.

sheet.description: When you cast a spell of level 1 or higher, roll a d100. If you roll below your warlock level, you cast that spell without expending the spell slot.

description.p: Your body turns incorporeal and you posess your familiar for up to 1d4 minutes + proficiency + your Charisma modifier.

sheet.description: Your body turns incorporeal and you posess your familiar for up to 1d4 + {{possession}} minutes.

description.p: You gain an Additional Attack when taking the Attack action. This stacks with the Thirsting Blade Invocation.

sheet.description: You gain an Additional attack when taking the Attack action. This stacks with the Thirsting Blade Invocation.

description.p: Emmisary of the Void

setters.set: Appears to be a sword hilt of a rapier
